utility

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Circle
          • utility.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Piece
extends javafx.scene.shape.Circle
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to create a Piece object to be placed on the board and transported across the network Every Piece is a Circle, and has a x coordinate and y coordinate
    Author:
    Tyler Decarie, Travis Brady
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
